articles.title: Talks between Chairman of DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and Speaker of Iranian Majilis Held
articles.content:
Talks between Chairman of DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and Speaker of Iranian Majilis Held
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- There took place talks between Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and Ali Larijani, speaker of the Iranian Majilis, on February 19 at the Majilis building.
					 Choe is leading the SPA delegation on an official visit to Iran.
					
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the SPA delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Iran, and from the Iranian side were members of the Iran-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group and an official concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks the two sides exchanged their opinions on further boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the SPA and the Majilis and other matters of mutual concern.
					
					 That day the SPA delegation was invited to a reception hosted by the speaker of the Iranian Majilis.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Arrives in Iran
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Arrives in Iran
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Chairman Choe Thae Bok arrived in Teheran on February 19 to pay an official visit to the Islamic Republic of Iran and take part in the 6th international conference in support of the Palestinian people to be held in the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cambodian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cambodian Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Op Sisawada, outgoing Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean President on Relationship with DPRK
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean President on Relationship with DPRK
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The relations between the two countries are always truthful and Equatorial Guinea regards the DPRK as the closest friend. The cooperation with the DPRK goes well.
					 Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo said this on February 14 when Kwak Ji Hwan, DPRK ambassador to Equatorial Guinea, paid a farewell call on him.
					
					 The president noted that he appreciated the consistent policy of the DPRK strengthening the military capability for self-defence against the hostile forces and would as ever continue to closely develop the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy in Moscow gave a reception on Feb. 15 to observe the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Taysaev, chief of the Russia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma of Russia and secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, Konstantin Pulikovski, former presidential envoy to the Far East Region, and other personages of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions and artistes of the Academy Ensemble of the National Guard of the Russian Federation.
					
					 DPRK Ambassador Kim Hyong Jun and his embassy officials were present.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and other photos introducing the proud reality in the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the building of a socialist power, human cause of independence and development of the DPRK-Russia friendly relations.
					
					 A performance was given by the Russian artistes.
					
					 Meanwhile, a reception was given by the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk that day.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Beijing Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Beijing Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing of China gave a reception on February 15 to observe the 75th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Kong Xuanyou, assistant to the foreign minister, Wang Yajun, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party, Ci Guowei, deputy director of the Office of International Military Cooperation of the Central Military Commission, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned of China.
					
					 DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and his embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 In his speech at the reception, Ji Jae Ryong mentioned the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and his life dedicated to the people and noted that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people in the efforts to implement the decision of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He expressed the stand to make joint efforts to develop the DPRK-China relations of friendship.
					
					 Wang Jiarui said that the Chinese people would always remember Kim Jong Il who had developed the traditional relations of friendship provided by the leaders of elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 Hoping that the Korean party and people would make bigger successes in Korean-style socialist construction under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he expressed the will to make positive contribution to developing the relations between the two countries and defending the regional peace and stability.
					
					 Earlier on February 13, the DPRK embassy hosted a reception for diplomatic envoys of different countries to China.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Ryomyong Street under Construction
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Ryomyong Street under Construction
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of Ryomyong Street under construction.
					 Going round various parts of the street, including the site for building 70-storied apartment house, he encouraged servicepersons and builders in an all-out charge to wind up its construction before the Day of the Sun.
					
					 A consultative meeting was convened on the spot to discuss the matters arising in completing the street construction ahead of schedule.
					
					 Earlier, the premier inspected the Sariwon Coal Mine and deliberated on the matters for increasing the production of coal badly needed for various economic sectors.

articles.title: Kangwon Provincial Ideological Workers Meet
articles.content:
Kangwon Provincial Ideological Workers Meet
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Ideological workers in Kangwon Province met at Wonsan City on Feb. 19 to vow to give fuller play to the spirit of Kangwon Province.
					 Attending the meeting were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Pak Jong Nam, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of party and working people's organizations, party information officials, exemplary lecturers, agitators and information workers each in charge of five families in the province.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed achievements and experience made in the struggle to decisively implement the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il and the Party's policies and discussed measures to give fuller play to the spirit of Kangwon Province in this year's all-people general charge in the drive of creating the Mallima speed.
					
					 Ri Kwang Chol, vice-chairman of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, said in a report that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un called the decisive fighting spirit of people on the land of Kangwon to unconditionally carry out the Kim Jong Il's last instructions and the Party's line and policies to the last the new spirit of the era and the spirit of Kangwon Province. This is the honor and pride of all the people in the province, he added.
					
					 He underscored the need to carry on dynamic struggle to turn the land of Kangwon into the prosperous socialist land of bliss in the great era of Kim Jong Un with the might of ideology, single-minded unity and self-reliance and self-development, remaining unfailingly loyal to him.
					
					 The speakers referred to the successes and experience they made in the days when they aroused the masses to implement Kim Jong Il's behests and the Party's policies by conducting the ideological work in depth and in a unique manner as required by the Party's intention and the developing reality.

articles.title: Tree-Planting Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Tree-Planting Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Tree-planting has been pushed forward in Ryomyong Street, Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Up to now, 120-odd units planted more than 25,000 trees of over 30 species in the street.
					
					 And several tree nurseries are cultivating many saplings and Pyongyang City has already prepared 190,000 square meters of turf.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Bureau of Passenger Service in Pyongyang and other units are paying deep attention to planting trees and tending saplings.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans from Japan Tours Various Places
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans from Japan Tours Various Places
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star led by Ri Ki Sok, advisor of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), visited the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital.
					 Going round various parts of the hospital, members of the group were deeply moved by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's loving care for the people.
					
					 They also toured the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, Pyongyang Orphans' Primary School, Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School, Ryugyong Kimchi Factory, etc.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Leaves
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo left here on Monday.
					 Earlier, departing were a delegation of the Association of Korean Business Persons in China led by Phyo Song Ryong and a delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City of China headed by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong.

articles.title: Korean Youths in China Hail Successful Test-fire of DPRK's Ballistic Missile
articles.content:
Korean Youths in China Hail Successful Test-fire of DPRK's Ballistic Missile
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nyo, chairperson of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China issued a statement on Feb. 15 to hail the DPRK's success in test-fire of surface-to-surface medium to long-range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2.
					 The statement said that all the members of the Federation and all other Koreans in China are full of national pride and happiness upon the news of the complete success of the test-fire that was held under the direct guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Extending thanks to Kim Jong Un who brought about such great victory as the complete success of new strategic weapon in the wake of the successful test of the first H-bomb and the launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, the statement continued:
					
					 The successful test-fire of Pukguksong-2 which dealt a heavy blow at the U.S. imperialists, the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries keen on bringing down the DPRK is a pride of Kim Il Sung's nation and this has instilled vitality into the glorious Kim Jong Un's era.
					
					 Growing stronger with each passing day is the public mindset supporting the DPRK and getting firmer is the fellow countrymen's conviction in the final victory of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 All the Korean youths in China will creditably discharge their mission as an overseas young vanguard of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on the road of patriotism, true to the guidance of the Marshal who is identical to leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Test-fire of Ballistic Missile Is Step for Self-defence: Korean in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Test-fire of Ballistic Missile Is Step for Self-defence: Korean in China
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Ri Sol Hui, deputy director of the Secretariat of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China, issued a statement titled "Test-fire of Surface-to-Surface Medium to Long-range Strategic Ballistic Missile 'Pukguksong-2' Is Measure of the DPRK for Self-defence" on Feb. 16.
					 The U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK published a press release in which they threatened to take "additional and crucial measure" while faulting the test-fire as "violation of resolution", the statement noted, saying that all the members of the Federation can hardly repress their surging indignation at this.
					
					 The test-fire was a measure for self-defence to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of the nation from a nuclear war threat posed by the U.S. and its vassal forces and ensure the peace and security on the Korean peninsula, it said.
					
					 The statement charged that the UN Security Council is taking issue with the right to self-defence of the DPRK, a sovereign state, after labeling its nuclear test and test-fire of strategic ballistic rocket as "illegal" under the pressure of the U.S.
					
					 We do not acknowledge the UN "resolution" which brands the DPRK's nuclear test and test-fire of strategic ballistic rocket as "illegal", it declared, adding:
					
					 We will fight it out against the U.S. imperialists and their followers, not pardoning any action of them slandering the DPRK's step for self-defence.

articles.title: Nothing Can Block DPRK's Dynamic Advance: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Can Block DPRK's Dynamic Advance: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's successful test-fire of a surface-to-surface medium long-range ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 showed again that nothing could break the strong faith and will of the Korean army and people who carry out to the last what they are determined to do and that nobody can block the dynamic advance of the DPRK toward rosy future.
					 Through the test-fire, the DPRK came to have more powerful military strength that can mercilessly smash the enemies' challenges for aggression and reliably defend the nation's sovereignty and peace on the Korean peninsula, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article, adding:
					
					 The enemies' heinous nuclear blackmail and sanctions resulted in the DPRK's increased nuclear attack capability.
					
					 No one can override the strength of Songun Korea filled with the invincible faith and will.
					
					 It is thanks to the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence, increased in every way that peace has been kept so far on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hot spot in the world.
					
					 Nobody can find fault with the DPRK's test-fire as it is a normal step to increase the national defence capability in every way against the evermore reckless nuclear threat from the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 Any desperate challenge of the hostile forces will never check the vigorous advance of Songun Korea.

articles.title: No Force Can Check Victorious Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force Can Check Victorious Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is busy deploying its strategic assets in south Korea and in its vicinity ahead of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises due in March and opening to public the specifications of those strategic assets. Its military bosses blustered that they would continue to dispatch to the Korean peninsula such strategic assets as B-52, B-1B and B-2 Spirit.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday stresses that Songun Korea remains unperturbed by the enemy's bluffing.
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear power possessed of even H-bomb which the world calls "absolute weaponry". The increased nuclear threat to the DPRK will put the security of the U.S. mainland in a greater peril, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The Trump administration has to bear in mind that it may lead the U.S. to its final ruin should it follows in the footsteps of the Obama group which faced only denunciation and derision by the world people, being branded as a defeater for its pipe dream of leading the DPRK to "change" and "collapse" during its tenure of office.
					
					 Neither high-intensity nuclear threat and blackmail nor economic sanctions will work on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has to face up to the reality and get awakened from pipe dream.
					
					 The present U.S. administration has to make a bold decision of policy switchover, not trying to repeat its totally bankrupt anti-DPRK policy.
					
					 No force on earth can check the victorious advance of the army and people of the DPRK, rallied close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Conservatives' Plan to Issue White Paper on Administrative Records of Park Regime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Conservatives' Plan to Issue White Paper on Administrative Records of Park Regime
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The conservative forces of south Korea, keen on prolonging their remaining days, now plan to make public a white paper on the four years of administrative records of traitor Park Geun Hye by the end of June. This deceptive document, the lead of the disgusting farce for which is to be taken by the puppet Chongwadae, will reportedly include "achievements" allegedly made by Park in promoting "state administrative tasks" such as "creative economy", "cultural prosperity", "people's happiness" and "peaceful unification" over the past four years.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Monday says this reveals the sinister intention to justify the despicable crimes such as sycophancy, treachery, confrontation with the fellow countrymen, and anti-social rule, calm down the people's anger and evade punishment by history.
					
					 The Park group of traitors is making all desperate efforts to get rid of ever tightening noose of ruin, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The group has gone so clumsy in justifying its dirty crimes to prolong its remaining days, thus mocking at people. This is touching off greater wrath and indignation of broad segments of south Koreans.
					
					 The commentary stressed that people's might, punishment of the public has to be shown to the traitors keen on mocking at people.

articles.title: 16th All-People Action Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
16th All-People Action Waged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The 16th all-people action for resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye was launched across south Korea on Feb. 18, according to local media reports.
					More than 844,000 people irrespective of age and sex took part in the candlelight actions held under the sponsorship of the emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 Thousands of Seoul citizens held a seminar for declaring the right to candlelight action at the Jangchung Stadium before launching a rally. Hundreds of thousands of people gathered at the Kwanghwamun plaza to start the candlelight rally.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					 At the end of the candlelight rally, its participants took to the streets. 
					
					At least 15,200 riot policemen were mobilized to repress the rally.
					
					 The demonstrators marched toward Chongwadae, the "Constitutional Court" and buildings of big business groups.
					
					 Similar rallies took place in Pusan, Taejon, Kwangju, Ulsan and about 100 other places of south Korea.

articles.title: Organization for Building Statue of Forced Labor Draftee Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Organization for Building Statue of Forced Labor Draftee Formed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea formed a committee for promoting the erection of a statue of forced labor draftee at the "National Assembly" on February 14, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 An inaugural declaration called for cherishing the memory of Korean workers who met unjust and grievous deaths, demanding the official apology from the Japanese government and making a proper settlement of the past history.
					
					 It underscored the need to check Japan from turning into a military power, and set a peaceful order to prevent another tragedy on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Military Warmongers Goes Reckless in War Drill to Invade North
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Military Warmongers Goes Reckless in War Drill to Invade North
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Command of the 2nd Fleet of the south Korean puppet Navy had become reckless in the naval maneuvers at the western coastal waters of Thaean, South Chungchong Province from Feb. 15 to 17, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The drills were staged with 10 warships, sea-patrol planes and new type naval operational copters, including new type escort ships under the control of the Fleet, and 9 air force aircraft involved.

articles.title: No THAAD Actions Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
No THAAD Actions Waged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment, Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment in south Korea reportedly staged an action against THAAD deployment in Seoul on Feb. 18.
					 The organizations held a rally in front of Kwanghwamun.
					
					 Speakers at the rally said that THAAD is not only disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula but bringing an economic crisis to south Korea, adding it is the way for preserving peace and tiding over the crisis to check its deployment.
					
					 A resolution, read out at the rally, contended that the authorities should comply with the demand of the candlelight rallies and halt at once the scheme for THAAD deployment and totally nullify the agreement on it.

articles.title: Sit-in Strike Staged Again in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in Strike Staged Again in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for South-North Economic Cooperation Businesses in south Korea staged another sit-in strike in protest against the puppet regime which has turned aside the payment of damages incurred by the suspension of the inter-Korean relations, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The protestors held a news conference in Seoul on Feb. 16.
					
					 Speakers recalled that enterprises for south-north economic cooperation had already staged a 100-day sit-in strike in demand of the payment of damages caused by the suspension of the tour of Mt. Kumgang pursuant to the authorities' "May 24 measure".
					
					 They declared that the sit-in strike would continue till the authorities have promptly paid prompt and adequate damages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries issued articles and statements praising the noble career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on Feb. 8 and 9 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, in an article posted on its website praised Kim Jong Il for dedicating himself to the people's happiness and national reunification all his life and making a big contribution to global peace and security.
					
					 The Korean people are performing world-startling miracles in the drive for building a socialist power under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Comrade Kim Jong Il, despite the ever more undisguised moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, the chairman noted.
					
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, in a statement praised the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who is boundlessly revered by all people for his gigantic exploits which are no match to any other great man in the world.
					
					 The chief of the Italian Organization for Friendship and Support to the DPRK in a statement said the ideology and theories advanced by Kim Jong Il will serve as eternal guidelines in the struggle to accomplish the cause common to humankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by a Bangladeshi publishing house on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Slovenian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Slovenian Organization
Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Slovenian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star on its website on February 8 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador camboyano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador camboyano
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 20 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador camboyano en Corea, Op Sisawada, quien le hizo la visita de despedida.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la reunion de funcionarios ideologicos de la provincia de Kangwon
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la reunion de funcionarios ideologicos de la provincia de Kangwon
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en la ciudad de Wonsan la reunion de funcionarios ideologicos de la provincia de Kangwon con el tema de poner en pleno juego el Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon. 
					Asistieron a la cita el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el presidente del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, Pak Jong Nam, los funcionarios directivos del Partido y entidades de masas, los funcionarios propagandistas del Partido, los lectores, conferenciantes y agitadores ejemplares y activistas politicos para 5 familias de la misma provincia.
					
					Se hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en la materializacion de los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y las politicas del Partido y se debatieron los remedios para poner en pleno juego el Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon en la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo de este ano haciendo mas intensa la campana de creacion de la velocidad Mallima.
					
					Al presentar el informe, el vicepresidente del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, Ri Kwang Chol, dijo que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un denomino como Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon, el nuevo de la epoca, el temperamento de lucha de la poblacion de Kangwon, que cumple incondicionalmente los legados del Dirigente y las lineas y politicas del Partido, e hizo aprenderlo a todo el pais, y agrego que este hecho es gran honor y gloria para los habitantes de la provincia. 
					
					Llamo a todos a trabajar con energia para convertir la provincia en un paraiso socialista en prosperidad de la gran era de Kim Jong Un dando pruebas de su fidelidad a este Maximo Dirigente y del poderio de ideologia, unidad monolitica y autofortalecimiento.
					
					Los oradores enumeraron los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en aquellos dias en que de acuerdo con el proposito del partido y la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo, realizaban de modo renovado y profundo la labor ideologica para llamar a las masas al cumplimiento de los legados del Dirigente y las politicas del Partido.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena publicacion de carta blanca de "meritos" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena publicacion de carta blanca de "meritos" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Sigue portandose mal la banda titere surcoreana, apresurada para mantener su precaria vida politica.  Bajo el protagonismo de Chongwadae, intenta publicar hasta finales de junio que viene la llamada carta blanca que recoge los "meritos" de 4 anos de mandato de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					En ese documento fraudulento, quiere anotar los "exitos" que supuestamente ha alcanzado Park en el cumplimiento de las tareas de la "administracion estatal" por sectores, incluyendo la "economia creativa", "cultura y prosperidad", "felicidad del pueblo" y "paz y unificacion".
					
					Esto es una expresion de la siniestra intencion de hacer apologia de los sucios crimenes cometidos durante el mandato de ella tales como el servilismo a grandes potencias acompanado de actos vendepatrias, la confrontacion fratricida y la politica antipopular y eludir la sentencia de la historia aplacando la indignacion de la opinion publica.
					
					Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Ahora, la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye esta desesperada para salvarse de la crisis de arruinamiento enganando la opinion publica.
					
					Tal comportamiento ponen cada vez mas indignados a los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores.
					
					Hay que demostrar claramente a los traidores, que tratan de burlarse del pueblo, cuan temibles son la fuerza del pueblo y el castigo de la opinion publica.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta cambio de nombre del "Partido Saenuri"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta cambio de nombre del "Partido Saenuri"
Pyongyang, 20 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" del Sur de Corea cambiaron el nombre de su organizacion como "Partido de Corea Libre" y enmendaron su programa y simbolo.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual divulgado la vispera, califica tal cambio como artimana para quitarse la deshonra de "partido privado de Park Geun-hye" y ocultar el antecedente bochornoso de haber practicado con ella las politicas antipopulares y actos de corrupcion.
					
					Aunque los pandilleros del "Partido Saenuri" tratan de eludir la crisis cambiando el nombre y mudandose a la nueva sede del partido, nunca podran ocultar la verdadera naturaleza de su agrupacion de complices de Park, estafadores politicos y traidores sin pares.
					
					En efecto, tan pronto como naciera, el "Partido de Corea Libre" defiende abiertamente a la diabla de Chongwadae y hace todo lo posible para frenar la aprobacion de dimision de ella en la "Corte Constitucional".
					
					Es natural que los surcoreanos de diferentes circulos consideraran como sucio el cambio de nombre del partido conservador.
					
					La realidad demuestra que ni el renombramiento del "Partido Saenuri" podra reparar el destino miserable de los titeres conservadores.
